item.title: 10 Best MCU Moments Of 2024, Ranked
item.description: The Marvel Cinematic Universe had shocking, emotional, hilarious, and many action-packed moments in 2024, and some of them rose to the top.

item.title: 10 Greatest Movie Mustaches Of All Time
item.description: From Borat and Anchorman to Tombstone and Pulp Fiction, a great mustache can go a long way in creating an iconic, larger-than-life character.

item.title: The Lion King's New Prequel Confirms A Major Difference Between Simba & Mufasa As Kings
item.description: Mufasa: The Lion King confirms a key difference between the original ruler of the Pride Lands and Simba, who would come to succeed his father as king.
